eztv is normally so good!
please re-upload if possible. this doc is so so good.

Thanks to eztv for providing this incredible programme.

If you are in any doubt about downloading this, DO download it! 

I thought "oh just another wildlife programme" but my dad had some clips on catchup and it looked amazing so I grabbed the full programme and OMG, one of the best programmes I have ever seen. 

People knock the BBC including me for their bias media but this is simply the planet Earth as you have never been able to see it before, the BBC is miles ahead of anyone when it comes to making wildlife programmes, even the US doesn't put out anything like the same in depth programme as the BBC with wildlife.

David Attenborough should have Sir in front of his name for doing this. Watching the end of this episode you will see and realize the risks taken to make the programme. 

10/10

Annoying irresponsible comment above.

Yes, Download this programme, DON'T DOWNLOAD THIS PARTICULAR FILE as it is faulty, corrupt as is clearly stated by most of the previous comments.
